// Email Service for Program Applications // This would integrate with your email service provider (SendGrid, AWS SES, etc.) export const sendApplicationConfirmation=async data=>{try{// This would be replaced with actual email service integration console.log('Sending application confirmation email to:',data.personalInfo.email);const emailContent={to:data.personalInfo.email,subject:"Application Confirmation - ".concat(data.selectedProgram),html:generateConfirmationEmail(data)};// Simulate API call await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,1000));console.log('Email sent successfully');return true;}catch(error){console.error('Failed to send email:',error);return false;}};export const sendInterviewSchedule=async data=>{try{console.log('Sending interview schedule email to:',data.personalInfo.email);const emailContent={to:data.personalInfo.email,subject:'Interview Schedule - TechAcademy Program',html:generateInterviewScheduleEmail(data)};// Simulate API call await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,1000));console.log('Interview schedule email sent successfully');return true;}catch(error){console.error('Failed to send interview schedule email:',error);return false;}};const generateConfirmationEmail=data=>{return" Application Confirmation

");};const generateInterviewScheduleEmail=data=>{return" Interview Schedule

Your Interview Schedule:

Round 1: Assessment Test
Date: [To be scheduled within 48 hours]
Duration: 90 minutes
Format: Online test
Topics: Technical knowledge, logical reasoning, basic programming concepts
Round 2: Communication Test
Date: [To be scheduled after Round 1]
Duration: 60 minutes
Format: Online video call
Topics: Written communication, speaking skills, presentation abilities
Round 3: Logical Reasoning Test
Date: [To be scheduled after Round 2]
Duration: 45 minutes
Format: Online test
Topics: Problem-solving, analytical thinking, pattern recognition
Round 4: Face-to-Face Interview
Date: [To be scheduled after Round 3]
Duration: 30-45 minutes
Format: Video call with panel
Topics: Final assessment, program fit, career goals discussion

Important Notes:

  • You will receive individual calendar invites for each round
  • Please ensure you have a stable internet connection and a quiet environment
  • All rounds must be completed within 2 weeks of the first round
  • Results will be communicated within 7 days of completing all rounds
